if(baseUrl.match(/cdn\/book\/chapterList/)){
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
data = JSON.parse(decode(result)).result.list;
var length = data.length;
chapterList = [];
for(var i = 0; i < length; i ++){
	 var name = "ğŸ®ã€–"+data[i].name+"ã€—ğŸ®";
	chapterList.push({
			text: name,
			href: null,
			volume: true
	})	
	data[i].list.forEach(($) => {						
		text = $.name;
		id = $.id;
		book_id = java.get('book_id');
		//book_id = baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+).html/)[1];
    href = `/cdn/book/content/${book_id}/${id}.html`;   
    chapterList.push({
			text: text,
			href: href	
	})
	})	
	}
chapterList
}
else{
	chapterList = [];
	datas = java.getElement("dd@a").toArray();
	//java.log(JSON.stringify(chapterList));
	for (var i = 0; i < datas.length; i++) {
    text = datas[i].text();
			hre = baseUrl.split(',')[0]+datas[i].attr("href");
			d=String(hre).split('\/');
list=[];
d.forEach((s, index)=>{ 
	 if (list.indexOf(s) == -1) {
 	   list.push(s);      }
		
		});
		href = list.toString().replace(/,/g,"/");
						
     chapterList.push({
		 	 text: text,
		  	 href: href	
      	})            
   };
	chapterList
	}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
result = JSON.parse(decode(result)).result.book;
//result = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(result));

burl=source.getKey().match(/([^#]*)/)[1];
id = result.id;

source_url= burl + `/cdn/book/source/${id}.html`;
$ =java.ajax(source_url);
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
$ = JSON.parse(decode($)).result.list;
n=0;//é»˜è®¤é€‰æ‹©æº
v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:n;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:n;

result.new_title = $[x].new_title;

if($.length>1){
		y = '\nğŸ“Œä½¿ç”¨è¯´æ˜ï¼š æ ¹æ®åºå·è®¾ç½®ä¹¦ç±å˜é‡æ¥åˆ‡æ¢æ¥æº(é»˜è®¤0)ï¼Œè‹¥ä¹¦ç±IDä¸º0 (9xé™¤å¤–)ï¼Œåˆ™ä¸ºç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹ç½‘ç«™ã€‚\nğŸ¯å½“å‰æºï¼šåºå·ğŸ”º'+x+'ğŸ”»ã€'+$[x].name+'ã€‘'+(x==0?' (é»˜è®¤)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\nâ¤åºå·ğŸ”º'+i+'ğŸ”»ã€'+$[i].name+'ã€‘\nä¹¦ç±IDï¼š'+$[i].internal_book_id+'\né€‰ç”¨ç‡ï¼š'+$[i].show_text+' \næºåœ°å€ï¼š '+$[i].chapter_list_url+'\næœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚ï¼š '+$[i].new_title;
	}
result.description += y
}

try{ book_id=$[x].internal_book_id; }
 catch(e) { book_id = id;}
 
 if(x==0&&book_id==0){ 
 	book_id = id;
 	java.put('book_id',book_id);
 	result.tocUrl = `/cdn/book/chapterList/${book_id}.html`;
 }
else if(x!=0&&book_id==0) {
	 tUrl = $[x].chapter_list_url;
	 result.tocUrl = tUrl+"," + JSON.stringify({"headers":{"Referer": tUrl}});
	}
else if(book_id!=0){ 
	java.put('book_id',book_id);
		result.tocUrl = `/cdn/book/chapterList/${book_id}.html`;
	}

result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.java.util 
);
with(javaImport){
    let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b");
    let ALGORITHM = "DES"; 
    let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding";
    let CHARSET = "utf-8";
    let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN");


function decode(data){
let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes());
let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks);
let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM);
let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET));
cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv);
return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET);

}
}

result=String(decode(content)+say);
}else{result=content+say}
</js>
